root: ^I hadn't given it much thought before, but the garden is rather grand and sings they very story of a magical garden. Everytime I come here, I always feel like Arietty from 'The Borrowers'.
^I want to get lost in the blue pool or climb the weeping sakura tree and overlook the magical scenery of Glimmering Creek.
^Dust seems to have the same thoughts.
^"Amazing, I hadn't the chance to look properly, but the gardens are truly beautiful. I am excited to grow more when the weather allows it.
^For now, I'd suggest you just go up to them and harvest them, they look about ready."
^Nodding I don't waste time and get to work.
